name: Unreal Obstacle Course
description:
This was a game I made to see what I was caple of doing in UE4 in a short space of time. My college tutor asked us to make an obstacle course, expecting us to just make simple jumping challenges. I went a little further than expected.

Save Data can be moved by navigating to:

C:\Users\name\AppData\Local\Obstacle\Saved\SaveGames

I also have plans to release the game's framework for people to download!

Note - Vsync disabled by default Recommendation: Play using the Masculine player model
